items.title: database
items.body: how could i use this library using aditionaly the ASN maxmind database?

items.title: Wrong usage example
items.body:
The usage example written in the readme is wrong. The Maxmind database isn't closed properly, even by calling `close`. I discovered this issue while using `maxminddb-geolite2` in a Flask project.

The proper usage example should be:

```python
from geolite2 import geolite2

with geolite2 as gl2:
    reader = gl2.reader()

    print(reader.get('8.8.8.8'))
    print(reader.get('125.25.6.5'))
```

items.title: Fails to install using setuptools
items.body:
Hi there,

Thanks for the nice library. It installs fine via pip, but it seems not via setuptools, I tested with CPython 3.4.3 and 2.7.10, and setuptools 18.2.

Specifically, it fails to find the "maxminddb" package for some reason. Installing maxminddb itself works just fine with the following setup.py:

``` python
from setuptools import setup
setup(name='foo', version='0.0.0', install_requires=['maxminddb'])
```

But if I use the following setup.py (`s/maxminddb/&-geolite2/`), it fails at trying to find maxminddb:

``` python
from setuptools import setup
setup(name='foo', version='0.0.0', install_requires=['maxminddb-geolite2'])
```

It fails like so:

```
% python setup.py install
running install
running bdist_egg
running egg_info
writing top-level names to foo.egg-info/top_level.txt
writing dependency_links to foo.egg-info/dependency_links.txt

reading manifest file 'foo.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
writing manifest file 'foo.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
installing library code to build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg
running install_lib
warning: install_lib: 'build/lib' does not exist -- no Python modules to install

creating build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg
creating build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/EGG-INFO
copying foo.egg-info/PKG-INFO -> build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/EGG-INFO
copying foo.egg-info/SOURCES.txt -> build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/EGG-INFO
copying foo.egg-info/dependency_links.txt -> build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/EGG-INFO
copying foo.egg-info/requires.txt -> build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/EGG-INFO
copying foo.egg-info/top_level.txt -> build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/EGG-INFO
zip_safe flag not set; analyzing archive contents...
creating 'dist/foo-0.0.0-py3.4.egg' and adding 'build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg' to it
removing 'build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg' (and everything under it)
Processing foo-0.0.0-py3.4.egg
Copying foo-0.0.0-py3.4.egg to /tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages
Adding foo 0.0.0 to easy-install.pth file

Installed /tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/foo-0.0.0-py3.4.egg
Processing dependencies for foo==0.0.0
Searching for maxminddb-geolite2
Reading https://pypi.python.org/simple/maxminddb-geolite2/
Best match: maxminddb-geolite2 2015.708
Downloading https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/m/maxminddb-geolite2/maxminddb-geolite2-2015.0708.tar.gz#md5=f4d113f89c9d5af25d7f6d67940dc796
Processing maxminddb-geolite2-2015.0708.tar.gz
Writing /tmp/easy_install-u6fqbqlm/maxminddb-geolite2-2015.0708/setup.cfg
Running maxminddb-geolite2-2015.0708/setup.py -q bdist_egg --dist-dir /tmp/easy_install-u6fqbqlm/maxminddb-geolite2-2015.0708/egg-dist-tmp-6bgxzpae
/tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/setuptools/dist.py:285: UserWarning: Normalizing '2015.0708' to '2015.708'
  normalized_version,
creating /tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/maxminddb_geolite2-2015.708-py3.4.egg
Extracting maxminddb_geolite2-2015.708-py3.4.egg to /tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages
Adding maxminddb-geolite2 2015.708 to easy-install.pth file

Installed /tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/maxminddb_geolite2-2015.708-py3.4.egg
Searching for maxminddb
Best match: maxminddb geolite2-2015.0708
Downloading https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/m/maxminddb-geolite2/maxminddb-geolite2-2015.0708.tar.gz#md5=f4d113f89c9d5af25d7f6d67940dc796
Processing maxminddb-geolite2-2015.0708.tar.gz
Writing /tmp/easy_install-59d29aps/maxminddb-geolite2-2015.0708/setup.cfg
Running maxminddb-geolite2-2015.0708/setup.py -q bdist_egg --dist-dir /tmp/easy_install-59d29aps/maxminddb-geolite2-2015.0708/egg-dist-tmp-ye_n2vea
/tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/setuptools/dist.py:285: UserWarning: Normalizing '2015.0708' to '2015.708'
  normalized_version,
removing '/tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/maxminddb_geolite2-2015.708-py3.4.egg' (and everything under it)
creating /tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/maxminddb_geolite2-2015.708-py3.4.egg
Extracting maxminddb_geolite2-2015.708-py3.4.egg to /tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages
maxminddb-geolite2 2015.708 is already the active version in easy-install.pth

Installed /tmp/setup/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/maxminddb_geolite2-2015.708-py3.4.egg
error: The 'maxminddb' distribution was not found and is required by maxminddb-geolite2
```

I'm not sure why it fails as a dependency from maxminddb-geolite2, but not by itself. Judging by the result, though, I'm guessing the issue is in this package.

Thanks again for the great package, I look forward to be able to using it as part of [tzupdate](https://github.com/cdown/tzupdate). :-)
